word: If the love of Jesus is cherished in the heart, it will be seen in the labors; the will and the manners will be brought under the moulding influence of the Holy Spirit. In the prayer of Christ just before his crucifixion, he said, \93And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.\94 The teacher of the people must be an example to the flock of God in all meekness, patience, forbearance, and love. He is, in a special sense, a living epistle, \93known and read of all men."How important, then, that the sanctifying power of the truth be seen in his character.
